text: 1. It’s giant fruit plate season and I could not be more excited. If I put a fruit plate out on the table, it’s devoured. 2. Just two chocolate chip cookies! Okay I need to make these today. 3. Realized the other day that my sourdough starter is over 1.5 years old. I can’t believe it! 4. Great journaling prompts for May. 5. I love making my own little snack mix. Mini pb pretzels, crispy edamame, pistachios – it’s the fave combo right now. 6. How to set boundaries. I have become the queen of this! 7. TV Things. I finished the Four Seasons and oh my it was kind of depressing! Like should we all just be in therapy?! Cast was fantastic! 8. Zendaya’s look at the Met Gala was unreal!! 9. A meditation for feeling overwhelmed.
html:
1. It’s giant fruit plate season and I could not be more excited. If I put a fruit plate out on the table, it’s devoured.

2. Just two chocolate chip cookies! Okay I need to make these today.

3. Realized the other day that my sourdough starter is over 1.5 years old. I can’t believe it!

4. Great journaling prompts for May.

5. I love making my own little snack mix. Mini pb pretzels, crispy edamame, pistachios – it’s the fave combo right now.

6. How to set boundaries. I have become the queen of this!

7. TV Things. I finished the Four Seasons and oh my it was kind of depressing! Like should we all just be in therapy?! Cast was fantastic!

8. Zendaya’s look at the Met Gala was unreal!!

9. A meditation for feeling overwhelmed.
